name: Street Fighter II: The World Tour
name_original: Street Fighter II: The World Tour
description:
Take a tour of the 8 different locations in Street Fighter 2: The World Warrior. This is a demo that tests out a few things in my Cardboard Game Machine engine. No ending or secrets. Just panning, clicking, and a few little pieces of profile bio information to look at.

The engine is broken down into a few parts:

  • Backgrounds
  • Stickers

When you click on a sticker, it can either be interacted with or taken. For the purpose of this tour, it is strictly interaction.
